abstract.shortdesc: Troubleshooting scenarios with resolutions for the Compute service on an ESX deployment.

p.b: Unable to Create Instance Snapshot when Instance is Active

section.p: There is a known issue with VMWare vCenter where if you have a compute instance in Active state you will receive the error below when attempting to take a snapshot of it:
section.codeblock: An error occurred while saving the snapshot: Failed to quiesce the virtual machine
section.p: The workaround for this issue is to stop the instance. Here are steps to achieve this using the command line tool:

ol.li: Stop the instance using the NovaClient: nova stop <instance UUID>
Take the snapshot of the instance.
Start the instance back up: nova start <instance UUID>
